review: Anyone experiencing body aches on this drug? I feel like I have the flu on this medication.

Still had unbearable pain at times. Pain was still 24/7, but some what reduced, Very bad dry mouth, felt like I was choking all the time. I was always tired, but unable to sleep. Did not help suicidal thoughts.
Minimal positive effects.  Did have less weight gain on this then amitriptyline.  Not a miracle by any means.  Did experience negative emotional effects on this medication.
Aventyl Hydrochloride (nortriptyline):Had this medicine for two months along with 500mg Vitamin C. No Relief.

Took the edge of the pain.  Did boost my mood, and the tiredness took a day or two to adjust too. The worst was the dry mouth- I couldn't go anywhere without a bottle of water- and my blood pressure dropped to a dangerous low.  When my doctor took me off it, I ended up in the ER with a Flare up I hadn't experienced since being on the medicine.
